name: Hand Knit Colourblock Cushion - mustard navy
description:
A hand knit colourclock cushion, part of our colour knit range, this time in an mustard and navy combination.

Channelling a Scandi-feel, this colour combination and size makes this cushion an easy addition to any existing decor scheme.

Hand knit in 100% wool, warm hand wash and dry flat.

Details: 
Yarn : hand knit in 100% wool (warm hand wash and dry flat).
Size : to fit 45 x 45 cm inner (inner is not included in purchase). 
Finished with transparent zip at back.

Delivery: 
10 - 15 days from receipt of payment.

Options: 
Custom orders are our speciality. If you have a size or colour requirement that is more suited to your home, please get in touch.

name: Hand Knit Moss Stitch Cushion in Ecru
description:
A hand knit moss stitch cushion in natural ecru, part of our textured knits collection.
A staple and traditional colour knitted in an understated, yet effective pattern, makes this an ideal addition to an existing decor scheme.
This is a definitely a cushion that pulls together a decor look, a true basic.

Details:
Yarn : hand knit in 100% cotton-feel courtelle yarn (chosen for its machine wash and low pill properties).
Size : to fit 40 cm (16 inch) square inner (inner is not included in the listing).
Finished with transparent zip at base.

10 - 15 days 

Options:
Custom Orders are our speciality. If you have a size or colour requirement that is more suited to your home, please get in touch.

description:
Hand knit moss stitch cushion in perky tangerine, part of our textured knits collection.

A bright, happy colour in an understated, but effective stitch, makes this an ideal addition to an existing colour and decor scheme.

We think this cushion would look particularly fetching plumped up in a mix of cushions on the sofa.

Yarn:
100% courtelle, fully machine washable.

We choose this yarn not only for the fabulous colours, but it's low pill factor makes this a cushion that will keep its looks over a long time.

description:

The warm colour makes this an easy addition to an already existing home decor scheme, whilst the large stitch is a subtle update to classic cables. 
The size makes this a fabulous statement cushion on a comfy sofa.

name: Hand knit stars baby blanket
description:
Another colour choice for our cute baby blankets - this time in bright, bold red.  Contrast knitted stars motifs for little sleepy heads. 

Materials : 
Hand knit in cotton-feel 100% courtelle - fully machine washable - and sized 95 x 65cm.

**We like to think hand knit is an art and takes a little time. Please allow 10 to 15 days from receipt of order to completion.
**Custom orders are our speciality.  If you have different colour or size requirements, please get in touch.

name: Hand Knit Placemat - set of four in black and white
description:
Steal outside and catch some sun with long Sunday lunches or quick midweek dinners and in celebration of all things summer, we have hand knit placemats in a black and white combination.

The listing is for four placemats and we think it makes a lovely housewarming or wedding gift. Your order is beautifully wrapped in neutral paper with lovely satin ribbon. And if the black and white combination doesn't quite suite your dinner decor, please get in touch so we can customise your placemats.

Details :
Hand knit in cotton feel courtelle - fully machine washable (just in case there are any red wine stains....) and sized 40 x 30 cm (15.5 x 12 inches).

**Custom orders are our speciality, if there's a colour combination that works on your summer table, please get in touch.** 
**We like to think hand knit is an art and takes a little time - please allow 10 to 20 days from order to completion.**

name: Hand Knit Cable Hotwater Bottle - pick your colour
description: We are determined to keep the cold away here at Strikk Handknits and reckon a hand knit cable hotwater bottle is just the trick. Details : hand knit in cotton feel courtelle - fully machine washable - and all tied up with a pretty satin ribbon. A standard 35 cm x 20 cm hotwater bottle is included in your purchase, but if you already have one and just need a lovely cover, then please get in touch. **We like to think hand knit is an art and takes a little longer. Please allow between 5 - 7 days from order to completion.** **We love custom orders at Strikk Handknits, if you have a colour choice, please get in touch.** Pin It

name: Hand Knit Cushion 40 x 70cm - chocolate cable knit
description: Another in our cable knit collection, this time in yummy chocolate brown, however, the difference in this cushion is the size : 40 x 70 cm makes this a cushion that stands out from the rest. Team it with an existing colour scheme or use as a base for pretty floral cushions. Yarn : handknitted in 100% cotton-feel courtelle (fully machine washable) - with zip fastening at base. Size : to fit 40 x 70 cm inner. H&M home stock these inners which are available worldwide on their online homestore section - else, I can of course source for you and send you a complete cushion. Just convo me and i'll send you an invoice for the complete cushion. *We like to think of hand knit as an art and as such takes a little time. Please allow between 7 to 10 days from order to completion. *Custom orders are our speciality. If you have a particular colour or size requirement for your cable knit cushion, please get in touch. Pin It

name: Hand Knit Bolster 45 x 17cm - red cable knit
description: We've taken our favourite cable knit pattern and put it together with our favourite style cushion - a bolster. Big fan of bolster cushions, not only because they're decorative, but also because they're functional as a neck roll. And we think looks rather fabulous in chilli red. Details: Hand knit in cotton-feel courtelle for easy machine wash and all tied up in red satin ribbons. Size: To fit 45 x 17 cm bolster inner. **We like to think hand knit is an art and takes a little longer. Please allow between 7 to 10 days from receipt of order to completion. **Custom orders are our speciality. If you have a colour that would be more suited to your decor, please get in touch. Pin It

name: handknit lace vase cosy in white
description:
a tall cylinder vase is given an interesting and pretty twist with our handknit eyelet lace pattern in pure white - a beautiful and textured effect to show off your favourite flowers.
perfect on the mantel or pretty on the bedside table, and of course, a lovely gift.

details : handknit in 100% cotton. the cosy is secured at the bottom of the vase and can be removed for easy cleaning.
vase : included in your purchase and measures 25cm tall and 6cm across.

*the price is for one container.
*we love custom orders at strikk handknits. if you have a colour combination that is more suited for your decor scheme, please let us know.

name: Hanger Set - Hand Knit in Aubergine & Avocado
description:
Granted, knitted hangers are not necessarily an essential-cannot-live-without-it item, but goodness, a colourful hanger set goes a long way in brightening up your day (never mind your wardrobe).
On a practical note, knitted hangers prevent delicate fabrics from pulling out of shape or slipping off and ending up a crumpled mess on the floor, but we're just sticking to the bit where they're lovely and bright.

Hand knitted in 100% courtelle to fit 16.5 inch sturdy wooden hangers (included in purchase).

Delivery :
7 days from purchase.

name: Hand Knit Cable Cushion 50 x 50 cm - White
description: A hand knit cable cushion in pure white, part of our cable cushion collection. A statement cushion, both in size and colour. Beautiful on the couch, or even better on the bed. Knitted in our favourite South African yarn - 100% courtelle, fully machine washable and soft cotton-like texture. Details : To fit 50 x 50 cm inner (inners is not included in purchase). name: Hand Knit Cushion 45 x 45cm - apple ripple effect
description: We have to admit, Strikk Handknit's ripple and ruched effect cushion has had a lot of attention - not only is it one of our bestsellers, but also featured in the November 2010 UK edition of Ideal Home magazine (yes, can you tell, we're way proud) A simple stitch is given a textured twist by knitting a ripple and ruched effect in a pretty soft moss green - a tactile cushion just begging to be touched. Team it with other existing textured fabrics or matching palette for a relaxed, lived in look. Materials: Hand knitted in soft woolblend, soft to the touch - fully machine washable - with zip fastening at back. Size: To fit 18 inch / 45 cm square inner. **We like to think hand knit is an art and takes a little longer. Please allow between 7 to 10 days from purchase to completion. **Custom orders are our speciality. If you have a colour or size that is more at home in your home, please get in touch. Pin It

name: Hand knit 100% organic cotton bathmitt.
description: A hand knit 100% organic cotton bath mitt for a little extra pampering. Soft to the touch and the bobble effect designed to gently exfoliate leaving a lovely glowing skin. Suitable for daily use - just hang up to dry when you're finished. A great gift for someone who needs a little extra pampering, or maybe just something special for your yourself (you know we all deserve it). Pin It
